synopsis.text: Part one of the anime unveils a mysterious connection between Black Jack's latest patient and Pinoko's past, leading the unlicensed medical prodigy on a journey to confront long-suppressed emotions. In part two, Black Jack finds himself entangled in a dangerous web of politics and warfare when he is kidnapped by a war-torn country's government to perform a high-stakes operation on their dictator. Amidst a backdrop of love, betrayal, and rebellion, Black Jack must navigate these challenges while staying true to his medical ethics. This sequel to the 1993 Black Jack OVA promises a gripping narrative filled with suspense and emotional depth.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
